metadata.synopsis: The player approaches a goblin camp. Three goblins and a yena are huddled around a campfire, warily watching the shifting shadows. As you step into the light, one of the goblins steps forward to greet you. You can ask him about the shadowy environs, and he will demonstrate the shadow-curse by killing the hyena.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load SCL Main.- Enter the main SCL map via the mountain pass and proceed to the goblin camp below.- Dialog will start as you approach the goblin at the entrance.

7.speaker: Warrior Gronag
7.text: Hey boy - yeh want the bone? Yeh want the bone?
7.context: CinematicNodeContext: Bends down and picks up a bone, which he waggles at a hyena. The hyena bounces with excitement, ready to play fetch.NodeContext: Bends down and picks up a bone, which he waggles at a hyena.

9.speaker: Warrior Gronag
9.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin yeets the bone into the shadows - the hyena turns run after it.NodeContext: Goblin throws the bone into the shadows

37.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hyena chases the bone into the shadows and we lose sight of the beast. From the darkness we hear a growl, then a whimper, then a sickening crunch and a yelp as the beast is killed.InternalNodeContext: The hyena chases the bone into the shadow curse and disappears into the darkness. After a moment you hear a growl, then a yelp and a *crunch* as the animal's killed (all out of sight).

49.speaker: Player
49.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hyena chases the bone into the shadows and we lose sight of the beast. From the darkness we hear a growl, then a whimper, then a sickening crunch and a yelp as the beast is killed.InternalNodeContext: The hyena chases the bone into the shadow curse and disappears into the darkness. After a moment you hear a growl, then a yelp and a *crunch* as the animal's killed (all out of sight).

10.speaker: Player
10.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hyena chases the bone into the shadows and we lose sight of the beast. From the darkness we hear a growl, then a whimper, then a sickening crunch and a yelp as the beast is killed.InternalNodeContext: The hyena chases the bone into the shadow curse and disappears into the darkness. After a moment you hear a growl, then a yelp and a *crunch* as the animal's killed (all out of sight).

2.speaker: Narrator
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hyena chases the bone into the shadows and we lose sight of the beast. From the darkness we hear a growl, then a whimper, then a sickening crunch and a yelp as the beast is killed.InternalNodeContext: The hyena chases the bone into the shadow curse and disappears into the darkness. After a moment you hear a growl, then a yelp and a *crunch* as the animal's killed (all out of sight).

41.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gronag spots the player and raises his crossbow. A beat, then he relaxes.

26.speaker: Warrior Gronag
26.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gronag spots the player and raises his crossbow. A beat, then he relaxes.

46.speaker: Warrior Gronag
46.text: Heh. You see that blighter go? Swallowed whole by the shadow curse. Bet he was pure tasty.

19.speaker: Warrior Gronag
19.text: You're the True Soul we're taking to Moonrise, I'm guessing?

3.speaker: Warrior Gronag
3.text: Right you are. Go through and talk to Kansif - he's been waitin'.

59.speaker: Player
59.text: Why would you just assume that?

55.speaker: Warrior Gronag
55.text: Who else is gonna be wandering around in the dark?

48.speaker: Warrior Gronag
48.text: Besides - you got the stink of power on you. You learn to smell it, serving the Absolute.

18.speaker: Warrior Gronag
18.text: Go on through and speak to Kansif. He's not as honey-tongued as me, mind.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Speaking of power - go on and fetch that bone you threw.
1.context: NodeContext: charming, bit of a lick arse

5.speaker: Player
5.context: NodeContext: charming, bit of a lick arse

8.speaker: Player
8.text: I have power in spades, that's true - but it comes from me, not the Absolute.
8.context: NodeContext: charming, bit of a lick arse

23.speaker: Warrior Gronag
23.text: I meant it as a compliment, True Soul! No sweeter stink there is than that of power - yours, of course.
23.context: NodeContext: charming, bit of a lick arse

29.speaker: Player
29.text: I was sent here by another goblin.
29.context: NodeContext: knows rizzle is likely dead. Doesn't care

61.speaker: Warrior Gronag
61.text: That'd be Rizzle. Huh. Thought she'd be back by now. Oh well.
61.context: NodeContext: knows rizzle is likely dead. Doesn't care

0.speaker: Warrior Gronag
0.text: The curse gets deadlier the further you go in. But have no fear, boss. We've got a guide.

50.speaker: Warrior Gronag
50.text: Talk to Kansif inside - he'll run through it.

24.speaker: Warrior Gronag
24.text: Anything for a True Soul. Put in a good word for me at Moonrise, eh?

20.speaker: Player
20.text: One last thing - go and fetch the bone you threw.

54.speaker: Warrior Gronag
54.text: But we're ready to go. You just need to tell Kansif inside.

64.speaker: Player
64.text: Shoot him a knife-glare: you are worse than the shadows.
64.context: NodeContext: Hesitant, looking for a way out

36.speaker: Player
36.text: Those who refuse me do not live for very long.
36.context: NodeContext: Hesitant, looking for a way out

42.speaker: Player
42.text: Refuse me again and I'll strike you down with the power of the divine.
42.context: NodeContext: Hesitant, looking for a way out

31.speaker: Player
31.context: NodeContext: Hesitant, looking for a way out

13.speaker: Warrior Gronag
13.text: So you want me to... I mean, I'll just-...
13.context: NodeContext: Hesitant, looking for a way out

57.speaker: Warrior Gronag
57.text: So you want me to... I mean, I'll just-...
57.context: NodeContext: Hesitant, looking for a way out

62.speaker: Warrior Gronag
62.context: CinematicNodeContext: Walks into the darkness. Pause - then screams.NodeContext: Being killed off-screen by creepy shadows

11.speaker: Hyena
11.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sad that the goblin is dead

35.speaker: Narrator
35.text: *You focus on the source of the power, but it is quiet and still. It needs to rest.*

12.speaker: Player
12.context: NodeContext: very keen to get out of this conversation

15.speaker: Warrior Gronag
15.text: Ha! Haha! Of course. Good one.
15.context: NodeContext: very keen to get out of this conversation

38.speaker: Warrior Gronag
38.text: Now, eh... we'd best get goin', eh?
38.context: NodeContext: very keen to get out of this conversation

65.speaker: Player
65.text: Stay quiet. Let the wretched thing live.

58.speaker: Player
58.text: Relax. Just poking a little fun.

30.speaker: Player
30.text: A guide? I know of no man nor beast that could traverse such darkness unaided.

14.speaker: Warrior Gronag
14.text: You don't know? Oh, you're gonna soil yourself when you see him. But I won't spoil the surprise - that's for Kansif. Head on in.

25.speaker: Player
25.text: How do you plan on getting me through this cursed darkness?

6.speaker: Warrior Gronag
6.text: Don't worry boss, you're in good hands. We've got a guide.

27.speaker: Player
27.text: I thought light was enough to keep the curse at bay.

4.speaker: Warrior Gronag
4.text: Aye, in the shallows. But the curse don't care 'bout some itty bitty light once you get deeper. But don't worry, boss - we've got a guide.

28.speaker: Warrior Gronag
28.text: Argh! Hells - I near stained myself.

40.speaker: Warrior Gronag
40.text: Just seeing if this shadow curse is as bad as they say. Word is it eats anyone gets too deep into the dark.

22.speaker: Warrior Gronag
22.text: I take it you're the True Soul we're waiting on? Needs passage to Moonrise?

17.speaker: Warrior Gronag
17.text: Ready when you are, True Soul. Anything you need.
17.context: NodeContext: A little spooked by the player
